Calculate various embodied energy matrices

Source: R/embodied.R
calc_embodied_mats.Rd

Calculate various embodied energy matrices

calc_embodied_mats(
  .iomats = NULL,
  q = "q",
  g = "g",
  r = "r",
  L_ixp = "L_ixp",
  A = "A",
  R = "R",
  V = "V",
  U_feed = "U_feed",
  Y = "Y",
  G = "G",
  H = "H",
  E = "E",
  M_p = "M_p",
  M_s = "M_s",
  F_footprint_p = "F_footprint_p",
  F_effects_p = "F_effects_p",
  F_footprint_s = "F_footprint_s",
  F_effects_s = "F_effects_s"
)

Arguments

.iomats

a data frame containing matrices that describe the Input-Output structure (using the supply-use table format) of an Energy Conversion Chain. .iomats will likely have been obtained from the calc_io_mats function.
q

final demand (q) vector or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "q".
g

name of the g vector on output. Default is "g".
r

name of the r vector on output. Default is "r".
L_ixp

industry-by-product Leontief (L_ixp) matrix or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "L_ixp"
A

name of the A matrix in the .iomats data frame. Default is "A".
R

Resources (R) matrix or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "R".
V

Supply (R) matrix or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "V".
U_feed

Feedstock use (U_feed) matrix or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "U_feed".
Y

final demand (Y) matrix or name of the column in .iodata containing same. Default is "Y".
G

name of the G matrix on output. G is calculated by L_ixp * y_hat. Default is "G".
H

name of the H matrix on output. H is calculated by L_ixp * Y. Default is "H".
E

name of E matrix on output. E is calculated by W * g_hat_inv. Default is "E".
M_p

name of the M_p matrix on output. M_p is formed from column sums of positive entries in the various Qx matrices. Default is "M_p".
M_s

name of the M_s matrix on output. M_s is constructed by M_p * q_hat_inv * Y. Default is "M_s".
F_footprint_p

name of the F_footprint_p matrix on output. F_footprint_p is calculated by M_p * (M_p^T * i)_hat_inv. Default is "F_footprint_p".
F_effects_p

name of the F_effects_p matrix on output. F_effects_p is calculated by (M_p * i)_hat_inv * M_p. Default is "F_effects_p".
F_footprint_s

name of the F_footprint_s matrix on output. F_footprint_s is calculated by M_s * (M_s^T *i)_hat_inv. Default is "F_footprint_s".
F_effects_s

name of the F_effects_s matrix on output. F_effects_s is calculated by (M_s * i)_hat_inv * M_s. Default is "F_effects_s".

Value

a list or data frame containing embodied energy matrices
